elusid.title: Elusid
elusid.description: Mere mention of this paragon of perniciousness is enough to send even practised pugilists into paroxysms of panic.
elusid.secondaryDescription: This myth-enshrouded monster is the main focus of many a mad theory, but only the Almighty knows the truth of its originsâ€¦

greygnarl.title: Greygnarl
greygnarl.description: The hero of the skies, back from the dead after his supposed slaying, and more mind-blowingly mighty than ever.
greygnarl.secondaryDescription: It was Barbarus the dark who brought back Greygnarl the light, his second brother after Styrmling the sacred.

greygnarl-(grotto).title: Greygnarl (grotto)
greygnarl-(grotto).description: The hero of the skies, back from the dead after his supposed slaying, and more mind-blowingly mighty than ever.
greygnarl-(grotto).secondaryDescription: It was Barbarus the dark who brought back Greygnarl the light, his second brother after Styrmling the sacred.
